name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the clique covering number of the Johnson graph J(n, k), n >= 2, 0 < k < n.
comment: T(2*k, k) = C(k) = A000108(k), the k-th Catalan number, for k = 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 16; whether this holds for other values of k is an open question.
link: Søren Fuglede Jørgensen, On the clique covering numbers of Johnson graphs, arXiv:2502.15019 [math.CO], 2025.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Clique Covering Number.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Johnson Graph.
author: _Søren Fuglede Jørgensen_, Feb 24 2025
